channel.title: Probably simple but im only human :P please help
channel.description: Right i am currently stuck i just added korsi sword and the special attack that comes with it too but the only problem is when i click the special bar and try and attack a npc it does nothing any ideas?

item.title: Probably simple but im only human :P please help
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

I have the models and the codes in place but when I click on the special bar and try and attack a npc nothing happens doesn’t even attack the npc

Read full topic
item.source: Probably simple but im only human :P please help

item.title: Probably simple but im only human :P please help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

IfearI:

How do you mean you added the special attack that comes with it? If you refer to the model only. You also have to add some code in your source so it knows which gfx to use and such. If that’s not the case, it could help to post what you exactly did (code) so perhaps someone can see what you are missing.

Perhaps he added the anims and gfx as well?

Anyways, OP, there’s a lot of tutorials on this:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=488684.0
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/521439-pi-how-add-working-korasis-spec-draining-special-attack-bar.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/355480-pi-adding-korasi-spec.html

Read full topic
